text_prompt: Create an image following the given description: A close-up shot focusing tightly on the face of a human adult female, mid-30s in perceived age. Her eyes should reflect complex, swirling blue and green light originating from an unseen cranial interface device near her temples, referencing Image 1. The facial appearance, expression, and head position should reference Image 0. The lighting should be dominated by these reflected, cool tones, referencing Image 1.
